roi_calculation: Critical - Enables CI/CD and foundational quality gates.
infrastructure_setup: CI/CD integration, Test environment provisioning, Test data seeding scripts.
success_metrics: 98% CI pass rate; 75% reduction in manual regression time.
risk_factors: Tool setup complexity; Environment stability; Flaky E2E tests.
mitigation_strategies: Dedicated DevOps support; Isolate E2E tests in a stable environment; Implement robust test retry logic.
business_value: Enables rapid, reliable releases of core functionality.

roi_calculation: Medium - Reduces regression effort for secondary features.
infrastructure_setup: Performance testing environment setup; Expanded test data.
success_metrics: Increase E2E automation coverage from 60% to 80%; Establish performance baselines.
risk_factors: Increased test suite maintenance; False positives from performance tests.
mitigation_strategies: Refactor brittle tests; Fine-tune performance alert thresholds.
business_value: Improves quality of non-critical features and establishes performance guardrails.
